title: karuNai vaLLalE
sahitya:
karuNai vaLLalE paramA karaiyuduLLamE 
nin kaninda paranda manadai uNarnd-uNarnd-urginEn


anupallavi

  taruNamA mazhaiyaip-pOla dayavu koNDu payan aLitta


caraNam    aDuttu vanden ayarvu nIkki anbu kATTi abhayam aLittE
taDuttANDaruL koDuttANDAi tAi tandaiyum guruvumAna
